かっとばせ！ ホームラン競争
Hau ihn aus dem Feld! Der Home Run-Wettbewerb
Knock it out of the park! Home Run Contest
Envoie-la vers d'autres cieux ! Concours de home run
Metticela tutta nella Gara ai fuoricampo!
¡Sácala del parque! Concurso de home run
Knock it out of the park! Home Run Contest

Knock it out of the park! Home Run Contest

ピッチングマシンから発射されるボールを打ち返しましょう。
 100m以上飛ばせば「ホームラン」！
 それ以外はすべて「アウト」になります。
 10回アウトになってしまうまでに、ホームランをできるだけたくさん打ってください。
 記録はランキングボードに登録されるので、友達と競争しましょう！

Schlag die Bälle, die aus der Pitching-Maschine kommen.
Wenn du sie weiter als 100m schlagen kannst, ist das ein Home Run!
Alles andere gilt als "Out".
Versuche, so viele Home Runs wie möglich zu erzielen, bevor du 10 mal im Out landest.
Deine Rekorde werden auf der Ranglistentafel registriert. Trete im Kampf um die Spitze der Rangliste gegen deine Freunde an!

Hit the balls launched from the pitching machine.
It's a Home Run if you can hit it over 100m!
Anything else is an Out.
Hit as many home runs as you can before reaching 10 outs.
Your records will be recorded on the ranking board. Compete with your friends for the top ranking!

Frappez les balles lancées par la machine à lancer.
Vous ferez un home run si vous arrivez à en frapper une à plus de 100m !
Toute autre frappe est "out".
Faites autant de home run que vous pouvez avant d'atteindre 10 outs.
Votre score sera enregistré sur le tableau de classement. Mesurez-vous à vos amis et visez la première place !

Colpisci le palle lanciate dalla macchina lanciapalle.
I fuoricampo vengono assegnati ogni volta che si spedisce la palla oltre i 100 m!
Tutti gli altri colpi vengono considerati "out".
Ottieni più fuoricampo che puoi prima di raggiungere 10 out.
I tuoi record verranno riportati in classifica. Sfida i tuoi amici e diventa il numero uno!

Golpea las bolas que salen de la máquina de lanzamiento.
¡Si la mandas a más de 100m es un home run!
Cualquier otra cosa es una eliminación.
Golpea tantos home run como puedas antes de alcanzar 10 eliminaciones.
Tus récords se registrarán en la tabla clasificatoria. ¡Compite con tus amigos por el primer puesto de la clasificación!

Hit the balls launched from the pitching machine.
It's a Home Run if you can hit it over 100m!
Anything else is an Out.
Hit as many home runs as you can before reaching 10 outs.
Your records will be recorded on the ranking board. Compete with your friends for the top ranking!

＜ホームラン競争に参加するには＞
<Compitiendo en el concurso de home run>

ホームラン競争に参加するには、以下のグランゼーラのアイテムのどれかを所有している必要があります。

 ・コスチューム「ベースボール」シリーズ
 ・コスチューム「キャッチャー」シリーズ

Du brauchst einen der folgenden Granzella-Gegenstände, um am Home Run-Wettbewerb teilnehmen zu können:

- Ein Outfit der Baseball-Reihe
- Ein Outfit der Catcher-Reihe

To compete in the home run contest, you must possess one of the following Granzella items.

- Costume Baseball Series
- Costume Catcher Series

Pour participer au concours de home run, vous devez posséder l'un des objets Granzella suivants.

- Série costume de baseball
- Série costume de receveur

Per partecipare alla Gara ai fuoricampo, devi essere in possesso di uno dei seguenti oggetti Granzella:

- Serie abbigliamento da baseball
- Serie abbigliamento da ricevitore

Para participar en el concurso de home run, necesitarás tener uno de los siguientes artículos de Granzella.

- Serie uniforme de béisbol
- Serie uniforme de receptor

To compete in the home run contest, you must possess one of the following Granzella items.

- Costume Baseball Series
- Costume Catcher Series

To compete in the home run contest, you must possess one of the following Granzella items.

- Costume Baseball Series
- Costume Catcher Series

To compete in the home run contest, you must possess one of the following Granzella items.

- Costume Baseball Series
- Costume Catcher Series

To compete in the home run contest, you must possess one of the following Granzella items.

- Costume Baseball Series
- Costume Catcher Series

To compete in the home run contest, you must possess one of the following Granzella items.

- Costume Baseball Series
- Costume Catcher Series
ホームラン競争に参加するには 特定のアイテムが必要です\n アイテムについてはゲーム起動時に表示される「ホームラン競争に参加するには」をごらん下さい

Du brauchst bestimmte Gegenstände, um am Home Run-Wettbewerb teilnehmen zu können.\n Welche Gegenstände das sind, erfährst du in den Anweisungen "Teilnahme am Home Run-Wettbewerb", die bei Beginn des Spiels eingeblendet werden.

To participate in the home run contest, certain items are required.\nTo see which items are required, please take a look at "Competing in the home run contest," which is displayed when the game is started.

Pour participer au concours de home run, certains objets sont nécessaires.\n Pour voir quels objets sont nécessaires, veuillez consulter "Participation au concours de home run" qui s'affiche quand le jeu commence.

Sono necessari alcuni oggetti per partecipare alla Gara ai fuoricampo.\nPer maggiori informazioni sugli oggetti richiesti, controllare la sezione "Partecipazione alla Gara ai fuoricampo" nella schermata che compare prima che il gioco cominci.

Para participar en el concurso de home run, se requiere la posesión de ciertos artículos.\nPara saber qué artículos son necesarios, échale un vistazo a "Compitiendo en el concurso de home run", que se mostrará al comienzo de la partida.

To participate in the home run contest, certain items are required.\nTo see which items are required, please take a look at "Competing in the home run contest," which is displayed when the game is started.

To participate in the home run contest, certain items are required.\nTo see which items are required, please take a look at "Competing in the home run contest," which is displayed when the game is started.

To participate in the home run contest, certain items are required.\nTo see which items are required, please take a look at "Competing in the home run contest," which is displayed when the game is started.

今回のホームラン記録は [HOMERUN]本 でした！\n しばらくすると メインホールのランキングボードに反映されるのでチェックしてみましょう
Dieser Home Run war Nummer [HOMERUN]!\nDu kannst deine Statistik wird auf der Ranglistentafel in der Haupthalle einsehen, also schau mal vorbei.
This home run was number [HOMERUN]!\nYour stats will soon be reflected on the main hall's ranking board, so check it out.
Ce home run était le numéro [HOMERUN] !\nVos statistiques seront bientôt affichées sur le tableau de classement de la grande salle, alors n'hésitez pas à les consulter.
Questo fuoricampo era il numero [HOMERUN]!\nI risultati riportati verranno riportati nella classifica riportata sulla tabella della sala principale.
¡Este home run es el número [HOMERUN]!\nTus estadísticas se reflejarán en la tabla clasificatoria de la sala principal, por si quieres echar un vistazo.
This home run was number [HOMERUN]!\nYour stats will soon be reflected on the main hall's ranking board, so check it out.
